name: meso
greetingText: The amazing and pretty queen that I'm so happy to have in my life.
wishText: May god always be with you and protect you! ;)
text1: Today is a precious day, It's your sweet birthday!!! :')
textInChatBox: Happy birthday!! Yeeyy! Have a great day and ...
text2: That's all I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Bless my days with your existence! I really hope this makes your day ^^
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again.
